text:
We're reporters...!
Amazing!

Yeah. By distributing introduction pamphlets to new students
and middle school exam takers at a certain middle school──

It's about easing the anxiety of starting a new
school life and making them look forward to it.
So, it's close to the age group of the readers──...

Yes...
So that Kaho-san... could look forward to it...
Motion

Right, if Kaho looks like she's having fun,
then it's a good page for her!

Hehe
Kaho, we're counting on you, okay?
I'll do my best...!
Yeah, let's give it our all!

─So, what we mainly want everyone
to do is around here.

The cover... the opening page...
Reports on the student council and club activities...
I see...!

Even though the camera crew will be involved, the photos
for the pamphlet should be prepared by ourselves.

Hehe,
our skills will come in handy, won't they...!
I'll take care of the coordination!

Oh,
Natsuha is the perfect choice for that.
Thank you, Natsuha-chan!

Yes, and...
shall we also assign responsibilities for each article?
Yes!
Motion
Motion

Haha...
Looks like we can leave the rest to everyone.
